2008 NBA Playoffs Summary

2007 Playoffs Summary 2009 Playoffs Summary

League Champion: Boston Celtics

Finals MVP: Paul Pierce (21.8 / 4.5 / 6.3)


2008 Playoff Leaders:

PTS: Kobe Bryant (633)

TRB: Kevin Garnett (274)

AST: Rajon Rondo (172)

WS: Kevin Garnett (4.1)
